bulkAttendanceAlertTitle: Bulk attendance applies to session and subject groups
bulkAttendanceAlertDescription: The selected attendance code will overwrite session and subject group attendance for the chosen date(s).
attendanceCodeNameShouldBeUnique: Attendance code name should be unique
selectUserGroups: Select user groups that will use this attendance code
administrationStaffAccessAllAttendanceCo: Administration staff access all attendance codes by default
youMustSelectAttendanceCodeBeforeApplyin: You must select an attendance code before applying a note
noSessionAttendanceForYear: No session attendance data available for this year.
studentAttendanceModalMessage: You are viewing attendance for {{student}}, where you can edit and apply updates.
noLessonsScheduled: There aren't any classes scheduled for this day.
youAreAboutToApproveAbsentRequest_one: You are about to approve this absent request which will notify the associated contact. Are you sure you want to continue?
youAreAboutToDeclineAbsentRequest_one: You are about to decline this absent request which will notify the associated contact. Are you sure you want to continue?
youAreAboutToWithdrawAbsentRequest: You are about to withdraw this absent request. This will also remove the request from the overview list. Are you sure you want to continue?
youAreAboutToApproveAbsentRequest_other: You are about to approve {{count}} absent requests.The requesting contact will be notified. Are you sure you want to continue?
youAreAboutToDeclineAbsentRequest_other: You are about to decline {{count}} absent requests.The requesting contact will be notified. Are you sure you want to continue?
unableToWithdraw: Unable to withdraw request which has been processed.
editAttendanceCodeTooltip: This is a default attendance code and can't be edited
youHaveNotSelectedPendingAndApproved: You have not selected any "Pending" or "Approved" requests
youHaveNotSelectedPendingAndDeclined: You have not selected any "Pending" or "Declined" requests

additionalLessons.description_one: Do you want to apply the attendance to this period also?
additionalLessons.description_other: Do you want to apply the attendance to these periods also?

deselectBulkAttendanceStudentsParagraph: Below is the list of students that will be included in this attendance. Please deselect them if you do not want them to be included.
